nodes.text: Phase I ARF armor was the standard issue armor of the Advanced Recon Force Scout Troopers, a special branch of clone troopers of the Grand Army of the Republic. It was later replaced by the Phase II ARF armor as the clone armor development shifted into Phase II.

Phase I ARF armor first appeared in Star Wars: The Clone Wars film as the design for an Advanced Recon Force Scout Trooper, albeit unnamed. It was later revealed as the Phase I ARF armor in a post on Star Wars Battlefront II website.
